where humanId = #{humanid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: select hf.humanId,hf.humanName,hf.humanSex,cffk.firstKindName,cfsk.secondKindName,cftk.thirdKindName,hf.humanProDesignation from humanfile hf LEFT JOIN configfilefirstkind cffk on hf.firstKindId=cffk.firstKindId LEFT JOIN configfilesecondkind cfsk on hf.secondKindId=cfsk.secondKindId LEFT JOIN configfilethirdkind cftk on hf.thirdKindId=cftk.thirdKindId where checkStatus=0 order by hf.humanId DESC

SELECT hf.*, cffk.firstKindName, cfsk.secondKindName, cftk.thirdKindName, cfk.majorKindId, cfj.majorId, cfk.majorKindName, cfj.majorName, xcbz.salarySum 'param', xcbz.standardName FROM humanfile hf LEFT JOIN configfilefirstkind cffk ON hf.firstKindId = cffk.firstKindId LEFT JOIN configfilesecondkind cfsk ON hf.secondKindId = cfsk.secondKindId LEFT JOIN configfilethirdkind cftk ON hf.thirdKindId = cftk.thirdKindId LEFT JOIN configmajor cfj ON hf.humanMajorId = cfj.majorId LEFT JOIN configmajorkind cfk ON cfj.majorKindId = cfk.majorKindId LEFT JOIN salaryStandard xcbz ON hf.`salaryStandardId`=xcbz.`standardId` where humanId=#{humanid} LIMIT 1

SELECT hf.humanId, hf.humanName, hf.humanSex, cffk.firstKindName, cfsk.secondKindName, cftk.thirdKindName, hf.humanProDesignation, cfjk.majorKindName, ssd.`standardName` FROM humanfile hf LEFT JOIN configfilefirstkind cffk ON hf.firstKindId = cffk.firstKindId LEFT JOIN configfilesecondkind cfsk ON hf.secondKindId = cfsk.secondKindId LEFT JOIN configfilethirdkind cftk ON hf.thirdKindId = cftk.thirdKindId LEFT JOIN configmajor cfm ON hf.humanMajorId = cfm.majorId LEFT JOIN configmajorkind cfjk ON cfm.majorKindId = cfjk.majorKindId LEFT JOIN salarystandard ssd ON hf.salaryStandardId = ssd.`standardId` WHERE hf.checkStatus = 1 AND humanFileStatus = 0 ORDER BY hf.humanId DESC
mapper.update: update humanfile set humanFileStatus=1,deleteTime=#{deletetime} where checkStatus=1 and humanId=#{humanid}
update humanfile set humanFileStatus=0,recoveryTime=#{recoverytime} where checkStatus=1 and humanId=#{humanid}
mapper.select: select hf.humanId,hf.humanName,hf.humanSex,cffk.firstKindName,cfsk.secondKindName,cftk.thirdKindName,hf.humanProDesignation,cfjk.majorKindName from humanfile hf LEFT JOIN configfilefirstkind cffk on hf.firstKindId=cffk.firstKindId LEFT JOIN configfilesecondkind cfsk on hf.secondKindId=cfsk.secondKindId LEFT JOIN configfilethirdkind cftk on hf.thirdKindId=cftk.thirdKindId LEFT JOIN configmajor cfm on hf.humanMajorId=cfm.majorId LEFT JOIN configmajorkind cfjk on cfm.majorKindId=cfjk.majorKindId where checkStatus=1 and humanFileStatus=1 order by hf.humanId DESC
